Content.Title: Gameplay

Images.Alt: Gif of getting hit by an asteroid in game

Text: The game is a 3D platformer where you hop from planet to planet. You use a mouse to rotate your character and space to leap from planet to planet. You use Left Click to jump over asteroids and right click to duck under them.

Content.Title: Synopsis
Text: There are 15 levels increasing diffculty each level starting for just normal hopping to planets on tilted rotations, at different levels, and even asteroids flying at the player!

Content.Title: Notable Features
Text: You can change your player's primary and secondary color in the settings.
Asteroids come in two forms, ones you have to jump over and ones you have to duck under.
You can change the game's diffculty in the settings menu.
If you beat all 15 levels you unlock a level select and a "cheat mode".
